meta.description: Maximize the profit from blending raw gasolines into regular and premium gasoline products.

params.name: octane
params.description: Octane rating of each raw gasoline.

params.name: availability
params.description: Daily availability of each raw gasoline in barrels.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per barrel of each raw gasoline.

params.name: min_octane
params.description: Minimum octane requirement for each final product.

params.name: selling_price
params.description: Selling price per barrel of each final product.

params.name: max_demand
params.description: Maximum daily demand for each final product in barrels.

vars.name: blend
vars.description: Barrels of raw gasoline blended into each final product.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum((selling_price[p] - sum(cost[r] * blend[r][p] for r in RAW_GASOLINES)) * sum(blend[r][p] for r in RAW_GASOLINES) for p in FINAL_PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling the final gasoline products.

constraints.name: availability_raw_1
constraints.description: Do not exceed availability of raw gasoline 1.

constraints.name: availability_raw_2
constraints.description: Do not exceed availability of raw gasoline 2.

constraints.name: availability_raw_3
constraints.description: Do not exceed availability of raw gasoline 3.

constraints.name: availability_raw_4
constraints.description: Do not exceed availability of raw gasoline 4.

constraints.name: demand_regular
constraints.description: Do not exceed demand for regular gasoline.

constraints.name: demand_premium
constraints.description: Do not exceed demand for premium gasoline.

constraints.name: octane_regular
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(octane[r] * blend[r]['regular'] for r in RAW_GASOLINES)
constraints.expr_rhs: min_octane['regular'] * sum(blend[r]['regular'] for r in RAW_GASOLINES)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum octane for regular gasoline.

constraints.name: octane_premium
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(octane[r] * blend[r]['premium'] for r in RAW_GASOLINES)
constraints.expr_rhs: min_octane['premium'] * sum(blend[r]['premium'] for r in RAW_GASOLINES)
constraints.description: Ensure minimum octane for premium gasoline.
